headline: Charter Communications (CHTR): Strategic Moves and Market Shifts in Warren Buffett’s Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of Warren Buffett’s 10 Longest-Held Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) stands against other Warren Buffett’s longest-held stocks. Warren Buffett has cemented his legacy as Wall Street’s most successful investor.
